```{r}
library(tidyverse)

library(haven)
library(tibble)
```
```{r}

```
```{r}
show_col_types = FALSE
```

```{r}
stereotypes <- read_csv("data/Cultural_Stereotypes_2022.csv")
```
```{r}
stereotypes %>%
  count(Race)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = stereotypes, 
       mapping = aes(x = Smart_M2,
                     y = MCB_Multi,
                     color = Race)) +
  geom_point()+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("red", "blue", "orange", "green", "gray")) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 8),
                    breaks = seq(0, 8, by = 1)) +
labs(title = "Multicultural Perspectives of Smart Stereotypes by Race",
     x = "Smart Stereotype of Asian Americans",
     y = "Multicultural Perspective",
     fill = "") +
  theme_clean()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = stereotypes,
       mapping = aes(x = Smart_M2,
                     y = MCB_Blind,
                     color = Race)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("red", "blue", "orange", "green", "gray")) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 8),
                     breaks = seq(0, 8)) +
  labs(title = "Colorblind Perspectives of Smart Stereotypes by Race",
       x = "Smart Stereotypes of Asian Americans",
       y = "Colorblind Perspective",
       fill = "") +
  theme_clean()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = stereotypes,
       mapping = aes(x = Race,
                     y = MCB_Multi,
                     fill = factor(Race))) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1")
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = stereotypes,
       mapping = aes(x = Race, 
                     y = MCB_Multi,
                     fill = factor(Race))) +
  geom_col(show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_label(aes(label = round(MCB_Multi, 1)),
             vjust = -1.1,
             show.legend = FALSE,
             color = "white") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,8),
                     breaks = seq(0, 8, by = 1))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = stereotypes,
       mapping = aes(x = Gender,
                     y = MCB_Multi,
                     fill = factor(Gender),
                     show.legend = FALSE,)) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 8),
                     breaks = seq(0, 8, by = 1))
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = MCB_Multi_by_Gender,
       mapping = aes(x = Race,
                     y = MCB_Multi,
                     fill = factor(Gender))) +
  geom_col(show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_text(aes(label = round(MCB_Multi, 1)),
            vjust = 1.5,
            show.legend = FALSE,
            color = "white") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 8),
                    breaks = seq(0, 8, by = 1)) +
  labs(title = "Multicultural Perspectives by Race and Gender", 
       y = "Multicultural Perspective",
       x = "") +
  theme_clean() +
facet_wrap(~Gender)
```
```{r}
stereotypes %>%
  group_by(Race, Gender) %>%
  summarize(MCB_Multi) %>%
  drop_na(Race, Gender)
```

```{r}
MCB_Multi_by_Gender <- stereotypes %>%
  group_by(Race, Gender) %>%
  reframe(MCB_Multi) %>%
  drop_na(Race, Gender)
```
